attributes.action: Change holiday insurance for cancer patients
attributes.additional_details: At least if the government take note and help people like my husband then more cancer patients would be able to fulfill there bucket lists and actually be able to afford to go on that dream holiday without having to pay extortionate fees for insurance because they have cancer !!!! I was discussed when I tried to get my husband insurance for a week away , it cost four times as much as the original holiday price
attributes.background: People who are diagnosed with cancer often there whole world falls apart , once they are diagnosed they often make a bucket list and holidays are part of that until you try to go , most cancer insurance is double or triple what a holiday costs that’s disgraceful !

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your difficulty getting travel insurance, but petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the cost of travel insurance are a matter for insurance providers, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
